steps.description: This is just a preview! Get the complete audit pack at [https://www.auditlabs.ai/store/p/2025-07-malda](https://www.auditlabs.ai/store/p/2025-07-malda)

When utilization exceeds the kink, rates jump to the second, steeper slope. Line 146 calculates the `normalRate` at the kink point. Line 147 finds the `excessUtil` above the kink. Line 148 applies the much higher `jumpMultiplierPerBlock` to this excess utilization, creating the jump rate behavior.
